attributes.action: Promote World Peace and STOP sponsoring wars by selling weapons to despots.
attributes.additional_details:
Sir Francis Drake defeated the Spanish Armada in 1588.
Admiral Lord Nelson defeated Napoleonic France in 1815.
Sir Winston Churchill defeated Nazi Germany in 1945.
Wisely we kept out of the USA war on Vietnam.
Great Britain stops wars, we do not sponsor rebels,
however "moderate" and we follow United Nations
international law. We uphold World Peace UK=OK!
attributes.background: The UK is OK because we stand for World Peace. We are not like the USA, Germany, France and Spain because we do not start wars, we STOP WAR. Please remember it is the duty of British Governments to remember our HEROES and do not deploy them to foreign conflicts.
